issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.description: When DataNode detects HSM type change during hot swap drive process, it should raises IOE and pass through it to {{DFSAdmin}} shell command.
fields.summary: Fix error propagation when hot swap drives disallow HSM types.
